name: No Such Justice
description:
A game made for Mini Jam 46: Justice. Per the jam limitations, the game uses a palette of only 5 colors.

This is act 1 of what could become a larger story about injustice and the failure of authority.

The game is made in Godot with art and coding by Michael Stroud and music by John White (https://soundcloud.com/where-am-we-be/).
